entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or wet snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
